mapper.select: select * from mymenuweek where id = #{id} order by month, week
select * from mymenuweek where id=#{id} and month = #{month} order by week
select * from mymenuweek where id=#{id} and month = #{month} and week = #{week} order by meal
select * from mymenuweek where month = #{month} and week = #{week} and meal = #{meal} and id=#{id};
mapper.insert: insert into mymenuweek (id, month, week,meal, mon , tue, wed, thu, fri, sat, sun, comment) values(#{id}, #{month}, #{week},#{meal},"","","","","","","",null)
mapper.update: update mymenuweek set meal=#{meal}, mon = #{mon},tue = #{tue},wed = #{wed},thu = #{thu},fri = #{fri},sat = #{sat},sun = #{sun} where num =#{num}
mapper.delete: delete from mymenuweek where id=#{id} and month=#{month} and week=#{week};
